author: ealexjordan
body:
VSO Product Backlog Item 388: Add usage help text to managed host. 

In the future we might want to look at either doing a man page with groff or creating a resource file. Right now this is the most inexpensive way of implementing.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Just noting that there's apparently a [CLI parser](https://github.com/dotnet/corefxlab/blob/master/src/System.CommandLine/README.md) we might want to use.

title: Managed host --help implementation
